name: Escape From The Dinosaurs
description:
Get ready for a dinosaur horror experience you won’t soon forget!

A dinosaur outbreak has happened right in the middle of your school day! You manage to hide out in the old security room, buy you need to escape the school before the dinosaurs find you. Use the security cameras to find the missing objects to escape. Be quick as you only have till 5:00PM.

Will you be able to survive and escape from the dinosaurs?

FEATURES:
* Creepy and frighting dinosaurs horror experience
* Use security cameras to watch dinosaurs and find objects
* Lot’s of jump scares :)
* Will you survive?


Dinosaurs spotted in the area:

Tyrannosaurus Rex:
One of the largest meat-eating dinosaurs

Spinosaurus:
Even bigger than the T-Rex!

Velociraptor:
Small and fast, and the sickle-shaped claw on the second toe of each foot make it a formidable predator

Dilophosaurus:
Fast-moving bipedal predator.

Compsognathus:
One of the smallest-known dinosaurs with sharp teeth!

If you like scary games, then you will love ‘Escape From The Dinosaurs’!
